name: open-stage-control-dev
description: This is the dev package, see ./app/package.json

scripts.postinstall: cd app && npm install && cd .. && npm run build-js && npm install build-css
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && electron-packager ./app open-stage-control --platform=$PLATFORM --arch=$ARCH --out dist/ --icon=resources/images/logo --overwrite --ignore "(app/node_modules/electron.*)"
scripts.watch-js: nodemon --watch app/browser/js -e js --ignore app/browser/js/browser-headless.bundle.js -x "npm run build-js"
